title: Va Va Nilava Pudichi lyrics Naan Mahaan Alla Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song : Va Va Nilava Pudichi 
Singer : Rahul Nambiyar
Composer: Yuvan
Lyrics : Na Muthukumar

Va va nilava pudichi tharava Velli bommaiyaaki thara
Oh oh vidyum pothuthan maranjipogume katti podu medhuva
Va va nilava pudichi tharava .......... katti podu medhuva
Vanathil yeri enukattu megathai alli mallakattu

Va va kattaalam anbal padikattu ...(2)
Va va nilava pudichi tharava .......... katti podu medhuva

Kavalai nammai silaneram kooru potu kondadum
Theeyinai theendi vazhum podhey dhepathil velicham undagum
Kadalai cherum nadhiyavum thannai thozhaithu uppagum
Aayinum kooda mazhayaai maari mendum adhuve muthaagum
Oru vattam poley vazhvagum oru vasalgal illa kanavagum
Adhil mudhalum illai mudivum illai purindhal thuyaram illai

Va va kattaalam anbal padikattu ...(2)
Va va nilava pudichi tharava .......... katti podu medhuva

Ah.ah.aah iravu paarthu miralathey idhayam verthu thuvalathey
Iravugal mattum illai endral nilavin azhagu theriyadhey
Kanavil neyum vazhathey kalayum podhu varundhathey
Kanavil pooum pookalai ellam kaigalil parithida mudiyadhey
Andha vanam poley uravaagum megangal dhinamum varum pogum
Ada vandhadhu ponal marubadi ondru pudhidhai uruvaagum
category: Song:Va Va Nilava Pudichi - Naan Mahaan Alla
